Morwicke 2019

October 19th, 2019

Schedule

October 19th, 2019: Ceremony at Thornewood Castle

more details on the way!

Location



Thornewood Castle in Lakewood, WA

8601 N Thorne Ln SW, Lakewood, WA 98498

The ceremony and reception will be held at the historic Thornewood Castle in Lakewood, WA. The Thornewood is a nearly 500-year old Elizabethan manor, originally located in England but painstakingly shipped and re-assembled in Washington under the purchase of Mr. Chester Thornewood. More recently, the Thornewood was used as the filming location for the Stephen King miniseries Rose Red.

Lodging

Guests are responsible for handling their own lodging, however we hope you can join us at McMennamin's Elk Temple in Tacoma, WA. Jess & Pablo will be staying there from 10/18 to 10/21. Be sure to book your room early as they will book up.

Transportation

We will be hiring a shuttle to and from downtown Tacoma on the day of the ceremony to Thornewood Castle. Tacoma and Seattle both have great transit systems, and Lyft is available. We also encourage guests to carpool.

Registry

If you'd like to contribute to our honeymoon fund, or some nonprofits we like, have a look at our Zola registry page.

Recommendations

Looking for suggestions for things to do in the Seattle area? We've put together a map of our favorite spots.

Contact

If you have questions feel free to contact Jess or Pablo for more information. You can also send us an email to our wedding info address:
